entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
